titleStmt.title: The Declaration of the Gentry of the county of Kent, who have adhered to the King, and suffered imprisonment or sequestration during the late troubles.
The Declaration of the Gentry of the county of Kent, who have adhered to the King, and suffered imprisonment or sequestration during the late troubles.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Gabriel Bedell, and are to be sold at the Middle-Temple-gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Col. Richard Spencer, Esquire [and 29 others].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
